original_text:
For day and night your hand was heavy upon me;
    my strength was dried up as by the heat of summer. Selah
korean_text: 주의 손이 주야로 나를 누르시오니 내 진액이 빠져서 여름 가뭄에 마름 같이 되었나이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: For day and night your hand was heavy upon me
sentences.korean_translation: 주야로 주의 손이 나를 무겁게 눌렀습니다

sentences.original_text: my strength was dried up as by the heat of summer
